install.name: SOBI2 Image Slider Module by MIhir Chhatre
install.author: Mihir Chhatre
install.description: SOBI2 Image Slidedhow, is a fully functional, feature rich slideshow module for SOBI2. This module picks up specific images from the base directory you define and allows you to add images for each category and entry. This makes it useful for people to display slideshows of any height, width and with quite a few transitions on any part of the page. This was specifically developed for a client who wanted an animated slideshow for each entry, without having to manually create a new entry everytime around. For any help, modifications, customization requests do get in touch with us on http://www.thoughtfulviewfinder.in

param.name: select_folder
param.label: Enter the direct folder path. Please do not have a trailing slash '/' at the end.
param.description: The folder path to the images you would like to show in the slideshow. Please select the folder path with reference to your base directory.

param.name: select_width
param.label: Width of the slideshow
param.description: Enter the width (in pixels). Please do not add 'px' at the end.

param.name: select_height
param.label: Height of the slideshow
param.description: Enter the height (in pixels). Please do not add 'px' at the end.

param.name: select_time
param.label: Duration to show each image
param.description: Enter the time in milliseconds. Please do not add 'ms' at the end.

param.name: select_animspeed
param.label: Duration of animation between to image
param.description: 750 is a good number, only change if you think it is too slow / fast. Enter the time in milliseconds. Please do not add 'ms' at the end.

param.name: select_controls
param.label: Do you want to show the Prev / Next Buttons
